short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Userscript manager compatible with Tampermonkey, Violentmonkey. Dark mode for every website. Stay synched on Chrome/Safari/Firefox.
short.zh_CN: 兼容油猴/暴力猴的用户脚本管理器。为每个网站提供深色模式。在Chrome/Safari/Firefox上保持同步。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Stay is a browser enhancement extension that greatly improves the browsing experience and playability of the browser.
Stay for Safari has gained the trust of over a million users in the Apple ecosystem.
Excitingly, now Chrome users can also use Stay!

Stay for Chrome now supports the following features:
1.User script management - Install or write Tampermonkey or Violentmonkey scripts to enable automatic page turning, immersive translation, prevent redirection, and aggregate search functions in Safari.
2.Dark mode - Provide dark mode for every web site.
3.File Download - Enhance file downloads in your browser by opening the Stay Popup panel, which allows you to quickly view all downloadable files on the current webpage.
4.Stay synched - Log in with your Stay account to sync your data across any device.

Contact Us
If you have any questions, feel free to contact us at feedback@staybrowser.com.
You can also follow our updates on Twitter at https://twitter.com/stayfork.
If you want more real-time feedback, feel free to join our Telegram group at http://t.me/fastclipchat.
long.zh_CN:
Stay是一款浏览器增强插件，借助Stay可以极大的提升浏览器的浏览体验和可玩性。
Stay for Safari已在苹果生态中获得超过百万用户的信任。
令人兴奋的是，现在Chrome的用户也可以使用Stay了！

Stay for Chrome已支持功能
1. 用户脚本管理 - 安装或者编写油猴或者暴力猴脚本，让你的Safari支持自动翻页、沉浸式翻译、防止跳转、聚合搜索等等功能。
2. 深色模式 - 为每个网站提供深色模式。
3. 文件下载 - 增强浏览器中的文件下载，通过打开Stay的Popup面板你可以快速的查看当前网页所有可下载的文件。
4. 保持同步 - 通过Stay账号，在你的任何设备上同步数据。

联系我们
如果您有任何问题可以随时联系 feedback@staybrowser.com
您也可以通过 X(Twitter) 来关注我们的动态  https://twitter.com/stayfork
如何您想更实时的得到反馈 欢迎加入我们的电报群组 http://t.me/fastclipchat
